conclusion: Consider how shadows change when light source moves.
Shadow of Object A is in the middle of the image.
Shadow of Object A will change in size and position if light source moves.
Shadow of Object A will remain in the same position.
Shadow of Object B is in the upper right corner of the image.
Shadow of Object B will change in size and position if light source moves.
Shadow of Object B will remain in the same position.
Shadow of Object C is in the lower left corner of the image.
Shadow of Object C will change in size and position if light source moves.
Shadow of Object C will remain in the same position.
Shadow of Object D is in the lower right corner of the image.
Shadow of Object D will change in size and position if light source moves.
Shadow of Object D will remain in the same position.
Shadows of all objects will remain in the same position when light source moves.
